it.polimi.se2018.model.dice

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.dice.Dice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that define the dice with a color and a value
    Author:
    Luca Genoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dice(DiceColor color)
      create a dice, in a game this constructor shouldn't be called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiceColor getColor()
      get the color of the dice
      int getValue()
      get the Value of the dice
      void increaseOrDecrease(boolean increase) 
      int oppositeValue()
      return the opposite value of the dice, this method don't set the value on the Dice.
      void rollDice()
      generates a random number belonging to the right domain [1,6], this method don't set the value on the Dice.
      void setValue(int value)
      set a value for the dice

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dice

        public Dice(DiceColor color)
        create a dice, in a game this constructor shouldn't be called. Only the factory should create a dice!, but for testing reason it's public.
        Parameters:
        color - of the dice

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        generates a random number belonging to the right domain [1,6], this method don't set the value on the Dice.

        return the opposite value of the dice, this method don't set the value on the Dice.

        the opposite value of the die
